## QualifierTypes.SystemQualifierType type

A discriminated union of all system qualifier types. This allows TypeScript to properly discriminate between specific qualifier type implementations and access their specific methods like getConfiguration().

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SystemQualifierType = LanguageQualifierType | TerritoryQualifierType | LiteralQualifierType;
```
**References:** [LanguageQualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.languagequalifiertype.md)<!-- -->, [TerritoryQualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.territoryqualifiertype.md)<!-- -->, [LiteralQualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.literalqualifiertype.md)
